org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.swf

Class ImageHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.swf.ImageHelper

  • public class ImageHelper
extends Object
    Utilities to help create SWF DefineBits and DefineBitsLossess image tags.

    • Method Detail

      • createShapeForImage

        public static DefineShapeTag createShapeForImage(DefineImage image,
                                 BitmapGraphicNode node)
        Creates a rectangle for the given width and height as a DefineShape. The shape is painted with a bitmap FillStyle with the given DefineBits tag.
        Parameters:
        image - The DefineBits tag encoding the image.
        node - The BitmapGraphicNode.
        Returns:
        A rectangle of given width and height as a DefineShape with a bitmap fill.

      • bitmapImageNeedsClipping

        public static boolean bitmapImageNeedsClipping(DefineImage defImage,
                               BitmapGraphicNode node)
        Determines whether the bitmap image should be clipped.
        Parameters:
        defImage - The tag encoding the image.
        node - The BitmapGraphicNode.
        Returns:
        boolean if bitmap should be clipped.

      • bitmapFillModeIsRepeat

        public static boolean bitmapFillModeIsRepeat(BitmapFillNode node)
        Determines whether the bitmap fill mode is repeat.
        Parameters:
        node - The BitmapFillNode.
        Returns:
        boolean if bitmap should repeat.
